name: Know more Thai
description:
Know more Thai

Different countries have different culture. When people "Know More Thai" is a full 3D 3rd person game to let its player learn about Thai etiquette and Customs. This game aims at supporting foreigners who plan to visit Thailand to learn about the rules,  social believes, and Thai cultures. 

The main location in the game imitates the tourist attraction places e.g. Wat Pra Kaew and Royal Palace which is one of the most important place in Thailand. The rules and instructions for visiting the place are disciplined in the game. There are officers patrolling to monitor the situations.  

This game is designed and developed by Somrak Photisar. He is a 2nd year student at the Department of Interactive Design and Game Development, College of Creative Design and Entertainment Technology, Dhurakij Pundit University.
